item.title: My poster got AI4X 2025 Poster Presentation Competition 2nd Prize
item.author: Wenhan Yu
item.description: I received 2nd Prize in the AI4X 2025 poster presentation competition at the National University of Singapore for “Multi-Agent DRL Framework for Coordinated HVAC Control in Large-Scale Buildings”.

item.title: I am honored to be the session chair of EAI WiSATS
item.author: Wenhan Yu
item.description: I am invited to be the 13th EAI International Conference on Wireless and Satellite Systems session chair.

item.title: My first jounal paper appears in JSAC
item.author: Wenhan Yu
item.description: The system model for the paper: The proposed solution, Asynchronous Actors Hybrid Critic (AAHC) for the paper:

item.title: Our paper got the best paper award
item.author: Wenhan Yu
item.description: Our paper “Mobile Edge Adversarial Detection for Digital Twinning to the Metaverse with Deep Reinforcement Learning” won the Best Paper Award in IEEE/ACM International Conference on Big Data Computing, Applications and Technologies (BDCAT).
